attributes.action: Hold a Referendum over the E.U. Constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the Labour Party's manifesto they promised to give the people of this Country a referendum on the E.U. Constitution, they are now trying to deceive the people by bring in a NEW version through the back door, save our Country from further interference from Brussels.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
